context_bundle.summary: Actor model architecture where each agent is autonomous actor with private state, mailbox for messages, and behaviors for processing

onboarding.quick_start: Model agents as actors: Private state (no shared memory), mailbox (inbox), behaviors (message handlers). Actors communicate only via messages.
common_patterns: Actor components: Private state, mailbox (inbox), message handlers
Message passing: Actors send messages asynchronously via mailboxes
No shared memory: Each actor's state is private and isolated
Actor creation: Actors can spawn new actors dynamically
Location transparency: Actors can be local or distributed
known_errors: Mailbox overflow if actor processes messages slower than received
Message loss if actor crashes before processing
Deadlock if actors wait for each other's responses
